extendedInfo.description: Allows anyone with Grand Theft Auto III for android to enter cheats into the game. Opens up the keyboard in game and displays a list of cheats available. No need for a physical keyboard anymore, everyone can cheat.Please read the troubleshooting or contact me before posting a 1* review. Half these comment are covered in the troubleshooting. Especially the people with the Galaxy Note, troubleshooting clearly tells you to download a specific keyboard if the cheats donât do anything.Important: Asking questions within the comments section on this page will not get you a response as developers can't view the email address of reviewers and have no way to reply to comments. Please contact me directly. Instructions1.	Open cheater app and press âStart Cheaterâ.2.	Start the game.3.	While in game press the new âCheatâ button at the top of the screen.4.	Find the cheat you want.5.	Enter it in the on screen keyboard that opens.6.	When you finish playing, open the cheater app again and press âStop Cheaterâ to remove the âCheatâ button.Please note: For the people that have given bad reviews because the guns cheat doesnât work. It does work but there is no confirmation message like some cheats, try changing weapon and you will have them all.Also note: The flying cheat for cars doesnât make them fly; it lowers their gravity so they can glide. This is enough to fly over the broken bridge onto the second island with fast cars such as the mafia car. If you get a tank, it can fly if you rotate the turret and fire backwards while this cheat is activated.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the cheats, works great except sometimes the keyboard wont pop up. Other than that great app! Recommended.
reviews.author: Aaron Laplantee

reviews.title: Fu** it
reviews.comment: Were the he** is the supid game it was a fu** waste of money  becuase they dont even have the actual fu**ing game dont ever buy this cheep sh** app!!!
reviews.author: Sebastian Lopez

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: I was doing research about cheats on gta 3 on android but unfortunately there wasn\'t. But!, this app was perfect for it! Without it I would suck at gta 3! Note:want infinite(not really infinite, I mean tons!) ammo? Well, using the have all guns cheat, keep typing \"guns\" and you will get a clip of 100 each \"guns\" you type! Your welcome! :-D
reviews.author: Mike perez

reviews.title: Its easy to use!!!
reviews.comment: Its awesome. Very easy to use with no complications. Recommend it to anyone loiking for easier fun.
reviews.author: Daniel Hicks

reviews.title: No pop-up keyboard
reviews.comment: I just love hoe this don\'t work Keyboard won\'t pop up when I click \"keyboard\" please help or fix , I also am complaining about the game itslef it laggs non-stop
reviews.author: Guero Ramirez

reviews.title: Too cool
reviews.comment: Its great. Works fine for me. But for some reason itll close itself amd then restart itself while im playing and it screws with gta3 because gta3 already has issues if u leave apps running so one restarting itself 3 or 4 times makes gta app crash

reviews.title: Codes dont work.
reviews.comment: Keyboard comes up and I type any cheat but nothing happens.  Need to fix please.
reviews.author: Sergio Aguirre

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Awesome.....Today I completed GTA 3.I will never have completed GTA 3 without this. Its simple & easy to use. Never showed any problems in my Tab. Thanks Bro.......

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Works good. Just read instructions first. Thanks for the app. (Werk goed en help baie. Lees eers die instruksies. Baie dankie vir die app.)

reviews.title: Thanks!  IMO, Best cheat ap available
reviews.comment: Works great, simple and effective... worth the expense. One issue... entering the rc car (giveusatank) my Iconia tablet crashes. All other vehicles work fine. Thanks again.

reviews.title: Don\'t get me wrong its GREAT
reviews.comment: Amazing, works great but please add a few more such as the REAL tank another weapons cheat and maybe never wanted

reviews.title: Fuckin bllock
reviews.comment: Its shit only the all.weapons cheat works im fuckin fuming im gonna kill whoever stole my money from this app !!!!!! >:(

reviews.title: Disappearing cheat button
reviews.comment: That cheat button appears and disappears when it wants to. So it hasnt been helpful at all during missions when I want full health or a lower wanted level. Keyboard is fine, cheats are fine. Fix that pesky button or it just remains useless.
reviews.author: Louis Leano

reviews.title: s3
reviews.comment: worse app ever. rob your money. you spend money and the instructions are unclear aswell as not even working. and when emailed they NEVER reply
reviews.author: Hamzah Younis

reviews.title: Like it a lot
reviews.comment: One thing I remember about playing GTA 3 was using the cheats so I could go on a rampage, this app it is exactly what I wanted.   Instructions are not unclear, people probably just need to actually read the description before complaining.

reviews.comment: I did everything that was said in trouble shooting and it did nothing

reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.title: Nice add-on to the game
reviews.comment: Works great!! No issues. A must have if you like to FSU.
